metadata.creator: Joseph Toscano (ZhayTee)
metadata.description:
The original soundtrack from Tux Racer, ripped in the best quality.
As the soundtrack sounds low quality ingame, i decided to rip all of them in the best quality possible.

In this Archive page, you will find the original original Impulse Tracker (.it) files, along with FLAC converted versions, which are extended for normal ripped music length.
You can see the files order clicking the SHOW ALL in the DOWNLOAD OPTIONS.

The FLACs were recorded through OpenMPT, from the original IT files, then, post-processed using FFMPEG.

Music composed by Joseph Toscano (ZhayTee) for Sunspire Studios, and finished in October 4th, 2000.

The boxart came from MobyGames (uploaded by DukeNukemmmm), then cropped and corrected using GIMP.

Tracks:
1. Title Screen
2. Race 1
3. Race 2
4. Won Race
5. Options
